item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:525674”] for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){ if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){ return; }

I would assume it’s right here, since there’s no else statements connecting to it. There is a bracket missing that may be the problem, not too sure how much it is spamming.[/quote]yep that’s it. it’s sending a message out to all players once for every naughty word. so add a bracket after that and get rid of one of the brackets at the end.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell Command

item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){ if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){ return; }

I would assume it’s right here, since there’s no else statements connecting to it. There is a bracket missing that may be the problem, not too sure how much it is spamming.

item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Okay, I Made A Yell Command And It Spams The Shit Out Of The server…

Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot


It Just Keeps Going…
Heres my command

[code=java] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
String[] bad = {“chalreq”, “duelreq”, “tradereq”, “. com”, “com”,
“org”, “net”, “biz”, “. net”, “. org”, “. biz”,
“. no-ip”, “- ip”, “.no-ip.biz”, “no-ip.org”, “servegame”,
“.com”, “.net”, “.org”, “no-ip”, “", “is gay”, "”,
“crap”, “rubbish”, “. com”, “. serve”, “. no-ip”, “. net”, “. biz”};
for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){
if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){
return;
}

						for (int j1 = 0; j1 < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j1++) {
							if (Server.playerHandler.players[j1] != null) {
								Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j1];


								if (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3) {
									c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=5>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here")) {
									c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here")) {
									c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here")) {
									c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here")) {
									c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Head Admin]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("rsn")) {
									c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Boss Owner]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here")) {
									c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here")) {
									c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								}else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0){
									c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");

								}
							}
						}
					}[/code]

can someone help me fix it ?
